Original:

店家很親切，願意讓我們帶阿宗麵線來吃，但是店家本身的餐點也很棒！配著一起，就是豐盛又愉悅的一餐

茶口味調酒很順口好喝，最喜歡「金萱」（上層有奶蓋+茶粉），朋友點的「東方美人」喝起來有巧克力味，很特別！太喜歡「龍山寺」的檀香味道，我們共點了三杯～是間願意二訪的酒吧。

The wine list is very good. The service staff will introduce the characteristics of each wine, and it will also recommend bartending suitable for their taste. The service is very kind.

Original:
這間酒吧是西門一個隱藏的寶石！從進門的那一刻起，氣氛就讓人感到放鬆又愉悅。裝潢風格充滿了現代感，又帶有一點時尚元素且主題十分特別，非常適合拍照打卡。調酒師的技術令人印象深刻，每一杯雞尾酒都精心製作，口味獨特且層次豐富。特別推薦他們的招牌雞尾酒清涼百草茶，風味絕對讓你回味無窮。

服務人員非常友善且專業，時刻注意顧客的需求，但又不會過於打擾。音樂選擇得恰到好處，不會太吵鬧，適合和朋友聚會或與伴侶共享浪漫時光。加上合理的價格和不錯的地點，這間酒吧絕對值得一去再去！

總的來說，這裡是想要享受高品質飲品和愉快夜晚的不二之選。推薦給所有尋找舒適且獨特酒吧體驗的人。
EN:
This bar is a hidden gem!From the moment you enter the door, the atmosphere makes people feel relaxed and pleasant.The decoration style is full of modern sense, with a little fashion element and the theme is very special. It is very suitable for taking pictures and punching.The technology of the bartender is impressive. Each cup of cocktails are carefully made, and the taste is unique and layered.Special recommendation of their signature cocktails, cool grass tea, the flavor will definitely make you memorable.

The service staff is very friendly and professional. He always pays attention to the needs of customers, but it will not be too disturbed.The music choice is just right, it will not be too noisy, suitable for gathering with friends or sharing romantic time with partners.Coupled with reasonable prices and good places, this bar is definitely worth going again!

In general, this is the best choice to enjoy high -quality drinks and happy nights.Recommended to everyone who finds comfortable and unique bars experience.

Original: 每次我在台北時，我都會向一些人推薦這家酒吧。這是台北最友善、最優質的雞尾酒吧。  工作人員總是很熱情並且超越。每次我回來他們都會添加一個很棒的新項目。西門最好的雞尾酒吧！

Original: 是的...沒有標誌，像門一樣的粉紅色發光金屬塑膠...您來對地方了。如果您是范諾夫雞尾酒愛好者，那麼這裡是台北的好地方！非常獨特的甜點，調酒師非常注重細節。非常美味的飲料，感覺就像傳統的甜點，帶有一絲頑皮的酒精。來自馬來西亞的愛！ 🇲🇾期待再回來！強烈推薦🥰
EN: Yes ... There is no sign, a pink glowing metal plastic like a door ... you have come to the place.If you are Vanov cocktail lovers, then this is a good place in Taipei!Very unique dessert, the bartender pays great attention to details.Very delicious drink, it feels like traditional desserts with a trace of naughty alcohol.Love from Malaysia!🇲🇾 Looking forward to returning again!Strong recommendation 🥰

Original:
台灣酒吧不多，只有居酒屋。
我參觀了一家雞尾酒吧，工作人員（有一個會說英語的人）友善地解釋了事情。
（戴著帽子的人看起來像Netflix《好女孩》中的Leo，會說英語）
一位女士和一位男士都是初學者，調酒師正在訓練他們，我很擔心，因為他們接觸冰塊的時間有點太長了。
所有的飲料都很美味！  菜單似乎每個季節都會變化。
它與評論中的菜單不同，因此您可能想要去獲得推薦，就我個人而言，最好的是菜單上的第一個！我推薦一杯與茶混合的飲料。
他們友善地給了我們酒精含量OK、不含酒精和低度酒精。
在您的旅途中至少去一次這樣的當地雞尾酒吧會很有趣，這似乎是當地人經常光顧的地方。
桌子較低，建議坐在吧台座位。
唱歌的音量不要太大，合適。
禁止外帶食物，但還是有人在吃東西，希望店家諒解。
我向尋找雞尾酒吧的韓國人推薦它！
EN:
There are not many bars in Taiwan, only izakaya.
I visited a cocktail bar, and the staff (a person who speaks English) explained things kindly.
(People wearing a hat look like leo in Netflix "Good Girl", speak English)
A lady and a man are beginners, and the bartender is training them. I am worried because they have been in contact with ice cubes too long.
All drinks are delicious!The menu seems to change every season.
It is different from the menu in the comments, so you may want to get recommendations. Personally, the best is the first one on the menu!I recommend a drink mixed with tea.
They are friendly to our alcohol content OK, alcohol -free and low alcohol.
It will be interesting to go to such a local cocktail bar at least once in your journey, which seems to be a place where locals often patronize.
The table is low, it is recommended to sit on the bar seat.
The volume of singing should not be too large, suitable.
It is forbidden to take food, but some people are still eating, I hope the shopkeeper understands.
I recommend it to the Koreans who are looking for the cocktail bar!

Original: 偶然發現這個地方在一條小巷子裡——外面的窗戶亮著粉紅色的霓虹燈，但沒有明顯的標誌表明這是一家酒吧。裡面非常現代、乾淨，有很棒的休閒播放清單。雞尾酒很獨特 - 他們有圍繞不同主題組織的非常周到的菜單。我們真的很喜歡更苦/更複雜的雞尾酒，所以我們從傳統中醫啟發的頁面中得到了一些，我真的很推薦這些！他們也有食物可供選擇，但我們沒有得到任何食物。
EN: I accidentally found that this place was in a small alley -the windows outside were on the pink neon light, but there was no obvious sign that this was a bar.It is very modern, clean, and great leisure playlist.Cocktails are unique -they have very thoughtful menus that are organized around different themes.We really like more bitter/more complicated cocktails, so we got some from the pages inspired by traditional Chinese medicine. I really recommend these!They also have food to choose from, but we did not get any food.

Original:
散發著粉紅色光芒的店家。進入需要一點勇氣。當我把手放在門把上和朋友們想著這件事的時候，店員打開門，用「你好」跟我打招呼，不知怎的我就進去了。
我點了各種雞尾酒，雞尾酒上得很慢，當第一個人喝完第一杯的時候，第七個人就已經上桌了，所以我不認為這裡不適合多人一起去。
雖然價格不便宜，但我很喜歡這裡獨特的氛圍。
EN:
Stores with pink light.It takes a little courage to enter.When I put my hand on the door handle and thought about it with my friends, the clerk opened the door and greeted me with "Hello", somehow I went in.
I ordered a variety of cocktails, and the cocktail was very slow. When the first person finished drinking the first cup, the seventh person was already on the table, so I don't think it is not suitable for many people to go together.
Although the price is not cheap, I like the unique atmosphere here.

Original:
我在找酒吧的時候偶然發現了這家店。
當我喝得醉醺醺的想進去的時候，一位年長的女士從酒吧出來叫我進去。入口極為可疑，粉紅色的內裝更顯得可疑。
走到後面的沙發座位。有幾個顧客。
確實很可疑，但客戶服務很普通。不，他仔細聽著。由於我們有 7 個人，我們無法立即為每個人服務，但他們按順序為我們服務，而且出來的雞尾酒很美味。我做得對。
進去比較困難，內部也有問題，不過還好。它不應該那麼貴。
EN:
I accidentally discovered the shop when I was looking for a bar.
When I was drunk and wanted to go in, an older lady came out of the bar and asked me to enter.The entrance is extremely suspicious, and the pink interior is even more suspicious.
Go to the sofa seat behind.There are several customers.
It is really suspicious, but the customer service is ordinary.No, he listened carefully.Since we have 7 people, we cannot serve everyone immediately, but they serve us in order, and the cocktails are delicious.I did it right.
It is difficult to enter, and there are problems inside, but fortunately.It should not be so expensive.

Original: 很棒的員工。非常友好和熱情。超級富有想像和創意的雞尾酒......每一種都有一些有趣的藝術天賦，讓你的男孩微笑。環境很好，遠離西門町的喧囂。龍山寺的雞尾酒可不是開玩笑的。
EN: Great employees.Very friendly and enthusiastic.Super imaginative and creative cocktails ... Each has some interesting artistic talents that make your boy smile.The environment is very good, far from the hustle and bustle of Ximending.The cocktail of Longshan Temple is not a joke.

Original: 我和我丈夫今晚度過了一段非常愉快的經歷 - 史蒂文和利奧非常友好，雞尾酒都很獨特！雞尾酒愛好者如果在台北，一生中至少要來嘗試一次（：謝謝你們度過了一個美好的夜晚！
EN: My husband and I spent a very pleasant experience tonight -Steven and Leo are very friendly, and cocktails are unique!If cocktail enthusiasts are in Taipei, they have to try at least once in their lives (: Thank you for spending a beautiful night!

Original: 很棒的經驗！如果您在台北，並且真正喜歡手工雞尾酒，那麼您一定要來這家酒吧！音樂很棒，你仍然可以交談，工作人員和調酒師都非常細心和貼心，飲料也很棒。秘密菜單中的“幸福結局”是我喝過的最好的飲料之一
EN: Great experience!If you are in Taipei and really like handmade cocktails, then you must come to this bar!The music is great, you can still talk, the staff and the bartender are very careful and intimate, and the drink is also great."Happiness ending" in the secret menu is one of the best drinks I have ever drank

Original: 可愛的氛圍和一位會說英語的調酒師！
EN: The cute atmosphere and an English bartender!
